Hangout.Server.WebServices.Rooms

Hangout.Server.WebServices.Rooms Class Reference

Inheritance diagram for Hangout.Server.WebServices.Rooms:

List of all members.

Public Member Functions

SimpleResponse GetRoomsForAccountId (uint accountId)
 Returns ALL rooms for an account regardless of disabled or default tags in the DB.
SimpleResponse GetRooms (string accountId, string accountIdCsvList, string privacyLevel, string isDefault, string roomId)
 returns a list of public rooms an optional parameters include: -accountId to specify the public rooms for only one user -privacyLevel


SimpleResponse GetSystemRooms (string roomId, string isEnabled)
SimpleResponse GetDefaultRoom (string accountId)
 Returns a room marked as default in the AccountToRoomMapping Table. This will return multiple rooms if the DB has more than one marked as default Set Default should fix that by marking all other rooms as not default.
SimpleResponse SetDefaultRoom (string accountId, string roomId)
SimpleResponse UpdateRoomDNA (string roomId, string roomDNA)
 Overwrites the stored RoomDNA for a given roomId.
SimpleResponse CreateRoom (string accountId, string roomDNA, string privacyLevel, string defaultRoomId, string roomName)
 Creates a new foom for a given accountId and stores the provided roomDNA in the database for longterm storage.
SimpleResponse DeleteRoom (string roomId)
 THIS SHOULD NEVER BE USED IN PRODUCTION UNLESS STRICTLY REQUIRED USE "DisableRoom" INSTEAD... which acts as more of a soft delete TODO... add authentication to this service.
SimpleResponse DisableRoom (string roomId)
 Marks a room as Disabled (this should be used as delete) Allows rooms to be "un-deleted".
SimpleResponse EnableRoom (string roomId)
 Switches a disabled room to enabled in the DB This is to be used like an UN-Delete of sorts in case someone deleted a room they wanted back.

SimpleResponse Hangout.Server.WebServices.Rooms.GetDefaultRoom ( string  accountId  ) 

Returns a room marked as default in the AccountToRoomMapping Table. This will return multiple rooms if the DB has more than one marked as default Set Default should fix that by marking all other rooms as not default.
